abstract: The hedge fund manager David Einhorn's withering assessment of Green Mountain Coffee Roasters sent the stock plunging on Monday.
snippet: The hedge fund manager David Einhorn's withering assessment of Green Mountain Coffee Roasters sent the stock plunging on Monday.
lead_paragraph: When shares of Green Mountain Coffee Roasters began trading on Monday morning, they held the distinction of being the best-performing stock on a major exchange over the last five years.

headline.main: An Investor Creates a Tempest in a Coffee Cup
